game.name: Ninja Cooking Sushi
game.description:
Amari-san is an extremely genius little girl who is equipped with amazing ninja skills and also loves to cook during her vacant periods. Today this prodigy little girl wants to prepare the most popular Japanese food. Hope you will help the beauty to cook this delicious Japanese recipe and bring a big smile to her face in Ninja Cooking Sushi. Make sure that you have a look at the instructions and indications to cook some scrumptious ninja sushi. Do your best and do something that could help make her feel proud on you in this free online cooking game for girls!

No need to worry kids! The genius Amari-san will be there to assist you when you face any unwanted obstacles. Be careful while searching for the ingredients and kitchen tools required to allow you to achieve the goal successfully. In the first place, you will have to help the girl to find out the hidden things in the kitchen. Come and play this brand new cooking game for girls and learn how to prepare the tasty sushi which you may have not tried before. 

You would not resist yourself to make this cool recipe in your real kitchen after enjoying this wonderful recipe in a virtual world. Although the job is pretty difficult, you can make it easier after paying attention to the important details. She will definitely be highly thankful to you if you have got a success in making the scrumptious sushi in the least possible time. This will help her to earn the maximum points in the end of this cute html5 game. Good luck girls to have a blast!
